useCase.name: Register Vehicle
useCase.description: The use case involves registering a new vehicle in the system.

preconditions.precondition: The administrator is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The vehicle is successfully registered in the system.

mainSequence.step: Administrator creates a new instance of Agencia.
Administrator creates a new instance of Furgoneta with specified details.
Furgoneta instance creates a new instance of Vehiculo.
Administrator creates a new instance of Blindaje.
Administrator creates a new instance of Premium.
Administrator creates a new instance of Coche with specified details.
Administrator registers the Coche vehicle with the Agencia.
Agencia adds the Coche vehicle to its list of vehicles.
